title: Who was Khalid ibn al-Waleed? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: and tell you more from the uk uh can you tell me who you carried even can i do what can you can you tell me you can even always okay uh taymur says who is khalid is one of the great companions of the prophet salaam who is known as the sword of allah and he was a great warrior a great fighter a great commander and there are so many tales and stories of in his biography of what he had given to islam and he was the nephew of uh one of the prophet's wives alahillah
